select ta.* from ( select questionno as seq,title , contents , 'Q' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY questionno order by readcnt desc ) as cnt from tb_questions where upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(contents) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' limit 10 ) ta
union all
select tb.* from ( select wikino as seq,title , contents , 'T' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY wikino) as cnt from tb_wiki where section = 't' and upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(contents) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' limit 10 ) tb
union all
select tc.* from ( select wikino as seq,title , contents , 'H' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY wikino) as cnt from tb_wiki where section = 'h' and upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(contents) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' limit 10 ) tc
union all
select td.* from ( select question_id::integer as seq,title , body as contents , 'Q' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY question_id order by view_count desc ) as cnt from tbl_stack_question where upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(body) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' limit 10 ) td

select a.* from ( select questionno as seq,title , contents , 'Q' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY questionno) as cnt from tb_questions union all select wikino as seq,title , contents , 'T' as status, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY wikino) as cnt from tb_wiki) a where upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(contents) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%'

select a.title from(select title,contents from tb_questions union all select title,contents from tb_wiki union all select title,body from tbl_stack_question) a where upper(a.title) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' or upper(a.contents) like '%' || upper(#{searchtxt}) || '%' limit 30
